The graphic shared on Facebook on May 7: 2020, claiming the extension of COVID-19 lockdown measures in certain areas, including Manila, until May 30.
The presence of the logo: TV48" on the graphic, indicating its source.
The text overlaid on the graphic stating: Enhanced Community Quarantine EXTENDED Until May 30, 2020" and listing the specific areas affected by the extension.
The statement issued by Nueva Ecija TV48: fake news," confirming that the claims of the extended lockdown until May 30 are false.
